segment.source: How to Install the Sequencer
segment.target: How to Install the Sequencer

segment.source: How to Install the Sequencer
segment.target: How to Install the Sequencer

segment.source: How to Install the Sequencer
segment.target: How to Install the Sequencer

segment.source: The Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer monitors and records the installation and setup process for applications so that the application can be run as a virtual application.
segment.target: The Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer monitors and records the installation and setup process for applications so that the application can be run as a virtual application.

segment.source: You should install the Sequencer on a computer that has only the operating system installed.
segment.target: You should install the Sequencer on a computer that has only the operating system installed.

segment.source: Alternatively, you can install the Sequencer on a computer running a virtual environment—for example, Microsoft Virtual PC.
segment.target: Alternatively, you can install the Sequencer on a computer running a virtual environment—for example, Microsoft Virtual PC.

segment.source: This method is useful because it is easier to maintain a clean sequencing environment that can be reused with minimal additional configuration.
segment.target: This method is useful because it is easier to maintain a clean sequencing environment that can be reused with minimal additional configuration.

segment.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer you are using to sequence the application and the computer must be connected to the network.
segment.target: You must have administrative rights on the computer you are using to sequence the application and the computer must be connected to the network.

segment.source: The computer must not be running any version of the Application Virtualization (App-V) client.
segment.target: The computer must not be running any version of the Application Virtualization (App-V) client.

segment.source: Creating a virtual application using the Sequencer is very resource intensive, so it is important that you install the Sequencer on a computer that meets or exceeds the recommended requirements.
segment.target: Creating a virtual application using the Sequencer is very resource intensive, so it is important that you install the Sequencer on a computer that meets or exceeds the recommended requirements.

segment.source: For more information about the system requirements, see Sequencer Hardware and Software Requirements..
segment.target: For more information about the system requirements, see Sequencer Hardware and Software Requirements..

segment.source: To install the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: To install the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer

segment.source: Copy the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer installation files to the computer that you want to install it on.
segment.target: Copy the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer installation files to the computer that you want to install it on.

segment.source: To start the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer installation wizard, select setup.exe.
segment.target: To start the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer installation wizard, select setup.exe.

segment.source: If the Microsoft Visual C++ SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) is not detected prior to installation, setup.exe will install it.
segment.target: If the Microsoft Visual C++ SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) is not detected prior to installation, setup.exe will install it.

segment.source: On the Welcome page, click Next.
segment.target: On the Welcome page, click Next.

segment.source: On the License Agreement page, to accept the terms of the license agreement, select I accept the terms in the license agreement.
segment.target: On the License Agreement page, to accept the terms of the license agreement, select I accept the terms in the license agreement.

segment.source: Click Next.
segment.target: Click Next.

segment.source: On the Destination Folder page, to accept the default installation folder, click Next.
segment.target: On the Destination Folder page, to accept the default installation folder, click Next.

segment.source: To specify a different destination folder, click Change and specify the installation folder that will be used for the installation.
segment.target: To specify a different destination folder, click Change and specify the installation folder that will be used for the installation.

segment.source: Click Next.
segment.target: Click Next.

segment.source: On the Ready to Install the Program page, to start the installation, click Install.
segment.target: On the Ready to Install the Program page, to start the installation, click Install.

segment.source: On the InstallShield Wizard Completed page, to close the installation wizard and open the Sequencer, click Finish.
segment.target: On the InstallShield Wizard Completed page, to close the installation wizard and open the Sequencer, click Finish.

segment.source: To close the installation wizard without opening the Sequencer, deselect Launch the program and click Finish.
segment.target: To close the installation wizard without opening the Sequencer, deselect Launch the program and click Finish.
